Name: Indecision.
About the game: A haiku platformer. It isn't for everyone, but you are welcomed to try it. The game won't take too much time to finish. It's short and vague. You just push left, right and sometimes jump. Epilepsy Warning: The game may be harmful to players with epilepsy or similar condition. /
